languages.text: "Твой дух пребудет со мной в палатах плазмадвигателя, пока тело останется недвижимым. Если Неумирающий будет милостив к тебе, ты услышишь то, что слышу я, увидишь то, что вижу я. Ощутишь мои мысли, словно они — твои. Но если ты закричишь мне, если отдашь приказ — я не услышу. Лишь колебания разума дойдут до меня по натянутой нити".

traits.locale_text: "Твой дух пребудет со мной в палатах плазмадвигателя, пока тело останется недвижимым. Если Неумирающий будет милостив к тебе, ты услышишь то, что слышу я, увидишь то, что вижу я. Ощутишь мои мысли, словно они — твои. Но если ты закричишь мне, если отдашь приказ — я не услышу. Лишь колебания разума дойдут до меня по натянутой нити".

languages.text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."
languages.original_text: "Твой дух пребудет со мной в палатах плазмадвигателя, пока тело останется недвижимым. Если Неумирающий будет милостив к тебе, ты услышишь то, что слышу я, увидишь то, что вижу я. Ощутишь мои мысли, словно они — твои. Но если ты закричишь мне, если отдашь приказ — я не услышу. Лишь колебания разума дойдут до меня по натянутой нити".

traits.locale_text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

"Your spirit will accompany me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless here, under the watchful guard of the enforcers. If the Undying One is merciful, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will feel my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear. Only the ripples of the mind will reach me over the winding thread."

"Your spirit will now accompany me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless here, under the watchful eye of the enforcers. If the Undying One is merciful, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

"Your spirit will now accompany me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless here, under the watchful eye of the enforcers. If the Undying One is merciful, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

"Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

"Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

"Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

languages.text: "Euer Geist wird mit mir zu den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern kommen, während Euer Körper hier bewegungslos zurückbleibt. Wenn der Todlose Euch die Ehre gibt, werdet Ihr hören, was ich höre, sehen, was ich sehe. Ihr werdet meine Gedanken denken, als wären sie Eure eigenen. Aber wenn Ihr mich anruft, mir einen Befehl erteilt, werde ich nichts hören. Nur die kleinen Ausläufer Eures Geistes können mich über den gewundenen Faden erreichen."
languages.original_text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Geist wird mit mir zu den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern kommen, während Euer Körper hier bewegungslos zurückbleibt. Wenn der Todlose Euch die Ehre gibt, werdet Ihr hören, was ich höre, sehen, was ich sehe. Ihr werdet meine Gedanken denken, als wären sie Eure eigenen. Aber wenn Ihr mich anruft, mir einen Befehl erteilt, werde ich nichts hören. Nur die kleinen Ausläufer Eures Geistes können mich über den gewundenen Faden erreichen."

"Euer Geist wird mit mir zu den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern kommen, während Euer Körper hier bewegungslos zurückbleibt, unter dem aufmerksamen Blick der Enforcer. Wenn der Todlose Euch die Ehre gibt, werdet Ihr hören, was ich höre, sehen, was ich sehe. Ihr werdet meine Gedanken denken, als wären sie Eure eigenen. Aber wenn Ihr mich anruft, mir einen Befehl erteilt, werde ich nichts hören. Nur die kleinen Ausläufer Eures Geistes können mich über den gewundenen Faden erreichen."

languages.text: «Su espíritu me acompañará a las cámaras del motor de plasma mientras su cuerpo permanece aquí, inmóvil. Si el Inmortal le concede su favor, oirá lo que yo oiga y verá lo que yo vea. Pensará mis pensamientos como si fueran los suyos. Pero si me grita algo o me da una orden, no podré oírlo. Solo las ondas de su mente pueden alcanzarme a través del sinuoso hilo».
languages.original_text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

traits.locale_text: «Su espíritu me acompañará a las cámaras del motor de plasma mientras su cuerpo permanece aquí, inmóvil. Si el Inmortal le concede su favor, oirá lo que yo oiga y verá lo que yo vea. Pensará mis pensamientos como si fueran los suyos. Pero si me grita algo o me da una orden, no podré oírlo. Solo las ondas de su mente pueden alcanzarme a través del sinuoso hilo».

«Su espíritu me acompañará a las cámaras del motor de plasma mientras su cuerpo permanece aquí, inmóvil, bajo la atenta mirada de los guardias. Si el Inmortal le concede su favor, oirá lo que yo oiga y verá lo que yo vea. Pensará mis pensamientos como si fueran los suyos. Pero si me grita algo o me da una orden, no podré oírlo. Solo las ondas de su mente pueden alcanzarme a través del sinuoso hilo».

languages.text: 「あなたの魂は私と共にプラズマドライブ室へ行き、あなたの体は動くことなく。不死の者があなたを祝福すれば、私が聞くものを聞き 、私が見てるものを見れるわ。私の思考を自分の思考のように読み取れるはず。だけど、あなたが私に呼びかけること、命令することは、私に届かない。あなたの心の波紋だけが、曲がりくねった糸を通して私に届くの」
languages.original_text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの魂は私と共にプラズマドライブ室へ行き、あなたの体は動くことなく。不死の者があなたを祝福すれば、私が聞くものを聞き 、私が見てるものを見れるわ。私の思考を自分の思考のように読み取れるはず。だけど、あなたが私に呼びかけること、命令することは、私に届かない。あなたの心の波紋だけが、曲がりくねった糸を通して私に届くの」
「あなたの魂は私と共にプラズマドライブ室へ行き、あなたの体は動くことなく、エンフォーサーが見守る中そのまま残る。不死の者があなたを祝福すれば、私が聞くものを聞き 、私が見てるものを見れるわ。私の思考を自分の思考のように読み取れるはず。だけど、あなたが私に呼びかけること、命令することは、私に届かない。あなたの心の波紋だけが、曲がりくねった糸を通して私に届くの」

languages.text: “你的精神会与我一同前往等离子驱动室，而你的身体会在这里一动不动。如果不死之神赐予你恩典，你将会看到我所看到的一切，听到我所听到的一切。你会把我的想法当成你的想法。不过，如果你对我放声大喊，或是对我下达命令，那我是听不到的。只有你心灵的涟漪，才能穿过缠绕的丝线，来到我身边。”
languages.original_text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

traits.locale_text: “你的精神会与我一同前往等离子驱动室，而你的身体会在这里一动不动。如果不死之神赐予你恩典，你将会看到我所看到的一切，听到我所听到的一切。你会把我的想法当成你的想法。不过，如果你对我放声大喊，或是对我下达命令，那我是听不到的。只有你心灵的涟漪，才能穿过缠绕的丝线，来到我身边。”
“你的灵魂会与我一同前往等离子驱动室，而你的身体会在这里一动不动，处于执法者的保护之下。如果不死之神赐予你恩典，你将会看到我所看到的一切，听到我所听到的一切。你会把我的想法当成你的想法。不过，如果你对我放声大喊，或是对我下达命令，那我是听不到的。只有你心灵的涟漪，才能穿过缠绕的丝线，来到我身边。”

languages.text: « Votre esprit m'accompagnera dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma, tandis que votre corps demeurera immobile. Si l'Immortel vous accorde sa grâce, vous entendrez ce que j'entends et verrez ce que je vois. Mes pensées vous sembleront les vôtres. Mais je n'entendrai ni vos cris ni vos ordres. Seuls les remous de votre esprit me parviendront au travers du fil ténu qui nous unit. »
languages.original_text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."

traits.locale_text: « Votre esprit m'accompagnera dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma, tandis que votre corps demeurera immobile. Si l'Immortel vous accorde sa grâce, vous entendrez ce que j'entends et verrez ce que je vois. Mes pensées vous sembleront les vôtres. Mais je n'entendrai ni vos cris ni vos ordres. Seuls les remous de votre esprit me parviendront au travers du fil ténu qui nous unit. »

« Votre esprit m'accompagnera dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma, tandis que votre corps immobile demeurera ici, sous la garde vigilante des prévôts. Si l'Immortel vous accorde sa grâce, vous entendrez ce que j'entends et verrez ce que je vois. Mes pensées vous sembleront les vôtres. Mais je n'entendrai ni vos cris ni vos ordres. Seuls les remous de votre esprit me parviendront au travers du fil ténu qui nous unit. »

languages.text: "Ruhun benimle birlikte plazma iticisi odalarına gelirken bedenin hareketsiz kalacak. Ölmeyen sana lütfunu bahşederse duyduklarımı duyacak, gördüklerimi göreceksin. Düşüncelerimi âdeta kendi düşüncelerin gibi zihninden geçireceksin. Fakat bana seslenirsen ya da emir verirsen bunu duyamayacağım. Bu çetrefilli iplikte yalnızca zihnindeki dalgalanmalar bana erişebilir."
languages.original_text: "Your spirit will come with me to the plasma drive chambers while your body remains motionless. If the Undying One graces you, you will hear what I hear, see what I see. You will think my thoughts as if they were your own. But if you shout out to me, if you give me an order, I will not hear it. Only the ripples of your mind can reach me through the winding thread."
